    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RMCostPlanHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RMCostPlanHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RMCostPlanHelper = Class.create();
RMCostPlanHelper.prototype = {
	initialize: function(gr) {
		this.plan = gr;
	},
	
	shouldCreateCostPlan: function() {
		var taskRecord = this.plan.task.getRefRecord();
		var shouldCreateCostPlan = !RMUtil.isAttributeBasedPlan(this.plan) && (taskRecord.instanceOf('pm_project') || taskRecord.instanceOf('pm_project_task') || taskRecord.instanceOf('dmn_demand'));
		return shouldCreateCostPlan;
	},
	
	showUpdateCostPlan: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('cost_plan');
		var costPlanExists = gr.get('resource_plan', this.plan.getValue('sys_id'));
		return costPlanExists;
	},
	
	updateCostPlan : function(){
		var gr = new GlideRecord('cost_plan');
		var costPlanExists = gr.get('resource_plan', this.plan.getValue('sys_id'));
		if (costPlanExists) {
			var costPlan = new CostPlan(gr);
			costPlan.syncChangesFromResourcePlan(this.plan);
		}
	},
	
	type: 'RMCostPlanHelper'
};]]></script>
